oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Renfro Valley Gatherin' - 1948-10-31 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Renfro Valley Gatherin' program, 1948-10-31, part 2, as recorded by WLAC, Nashville, TN. Featuring announcer Ken Meeker, host John Lair, and performers Pee Wee Wade Baker, the Mulkey Brothers, and the Coon Creek Girls (unconfirmed). Sponsored by Ballard & Ballard, a CBS syndication originating at WHAS, Louisville, KY.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Coon Creek Girls; Pee Wee Wade Baker; Mulkey Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: On Halloween Night [title unconfirmed] (Coon Creek Girls vocals, unconfirmed) [continued from part 1] -- John Lair talks about Halloween -- That Old Gang Of Mine (Pee Wee Wade Baker vocals) -- Ballard & Ballard commercial (Ken Meeker) -- John Lair introduces the Mulkey Brothers -- I Have No Mother Now (Mulkey Brothers vocals) -- John Lair reads birthday and anniversary dedications -- Let The Lower Lights Be Burning -- Closing statement (John Lair) -- Theme -- Ballard & Ballard commercial (Ken Meeker) -- Closing statement (Ken Meeker)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; WHAS (Radio station : Louisville, Ky.); WLAC (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Renfro Valley Gathering (Radio program); Meeker, Ken (Announcer); Lair, John; Baker, Wade; Coon Creek Girls (Musical group); Mulkey Brothers (Musical group)
